languages.text: В следующем космобою торпеды наносят на 25% урона больше, но в первых 2х раундах — недоступны

traits.locale_text: В следующем космобою торпеды наносят на 25% урона больше, но в первых 2х раундах — недоступны

languages.text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.
languages.original_text: В следующем бою ваши торпеды будут недоступны в течение первых двух раундов. Во время и после третьего раунда их урон будет увеличен на +25%.

traits.locale_text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During the third and the subsequent rounds, their damage will be increased by +25%.
In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.
In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.

languages.text: Bir sonraki çatışmanın ilk 2 raundu esnasında torpidolarını kullanamazsın. Üçüncü ve sonraki rauntlarda torpidoların verdiği hasar +%25 artar.
languages.original_text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonraki çatışmanın ilk 2 raundu esnasında torpidolarını kullanamazsın. Üçüncü ve sonraki rauntlarda torpidoların verdiği hasar +%25 artar.

languages.text: En el próximo combate, tus torpedos no estarán disponibles durante los 2 primeros asaltos. Durante el tercer asalto y todos los siguientes, su daño aumentará en un +25 %.
languages.original_text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: En el próximo combate, tus torpedos no estarán disponibles durante los 2 primeros asaltos. Durante el tercer asalto y todos los siguientes, su daño aumentará en un +25 %.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，前两轮中无法发射鱼雷。从第三轮开始，友方所有鱼雷造成的伤害提高25%。
languages.original_text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，前两轮中无法发射鱼雷。从第三轮开始，友方所有鱼雷造成的伤害提高25%。

languages.text: Im nächsten Kampf sind deine Torpedos in den ersten 2 Runden nicht verfügbar. Während und nach der dritten Runde wird ihr Schaden um+25 % erhöht.
languages.original_text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Im nächsten Kampf sind deine Torpedos in den ersten 2 Runden nicht verfügbar. Während und nach der dritten Runde wird ihr Schaden um+25 % erhöht.

languages.text: Lors du prochain combat, vos torpilles ne seront pas disponibles pendant les 2 premiers rounds. À partir du 3e round, leurs dégâts seront augmentés de +25 %.
languages.original_text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: Lors du prochain combat, vos torpilles ne seront pas disponibles pendant les 2 premiers rounds. À partir du 3e round, leurs dégâts seront augmentés de +25 %.

languages.text: 次の戦闘で、最初の2ラウンドの間、魚雷が使用できなくなる。3ラウンド目以降、ダメージが+25%増加する。
languages.original_text: In the next combat, your torpedoes will be unavailable during the first 2 rounds. During and after the third round, their damage will be increased by +25%.

traits.locale_text: 次の戦闘で、最初の2ラウンドの間、魚雷が使用できなくなる。3ラウンド目以降、ダメージが+25%増加する。

languages.text: В следующем бою ваши торпеды будут недоступны в течение первых двух раундов. Во время и после третьего раунда их урон будет увеличен на +25%.
